      • uploadWallPhotoRequest

        public static VKRequest uploadWallPhotoRequest(java.io.File image,
                               long userId,
                               int groupId)
        Upload a specified file to VK servers for posting on user or group wall
        Parameters:
        image - Image file to upload. Must have extension jpg or png
        userId - User wall id or 0
        groupId - Group id or 0
        Returns:
        Prepared vk request for photo upload

      • uploadWallPhotoRequest

        public static VKRequest uploadWallPhotoRequest(VKUploadImage image,
                               long userId,
                               int groupId)
        Upload a specified file to VK servers for posting on user or group wall
        Parameters:
        image - Special image object to upload
        userId - User wall id or 0
        groupId - Group id or 0
        Returns:
        Prepared vk request for photo upload

      • uploadAlbumPhotoRequest

        public static VKRequest uploadAlbumPhotoRequest(java.io.File image,
                                long albumId,
                                int groupId)
        Upload a specified file to VK servers and saves it into the album
        Parameters:
        image - Image file to upload. Must have extension jpg or png
        albumId - Album id to upload. Must be specified
        groupId - Group id or 0
        Returns:
        Prepared vk request for photo upload
